entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Port System.Security docs for .NET 9 APIs #106790
    9.0.0
  • Port System.Net docs for .NET 9 APIs #106789
    9.0.0
  • [browser][mt] Awaiting a `Task` returned by a `[JSImport]` method sometimes causes a deadlock #106788
  • [API Proposal]: File abstraction #106786
  • JIT: Implement fallbacks for `AdvSimd` intrinsics with `ConstantExpected` immediates #106761
    10.0.0
  • [Bug] UTF8 decoder fail to decode a byte array in a WASM app on combo Android ARM + Chrome + AOT #106755
  • NativeAOT status for Android #106748
  • Test failure: baseservices/exceptions/stackoverflow/stackoverflowtester/stackoverflowtester.cmd #106742

Closed

  • Port Microsoft.Extensions.Caching docs for .NET 9 APIs #105977
    9.0.0
  • System.Linq.Expressions.Tests.OpAssign.AssignmentEquivalentsWithMemberAccess causing crash #106207
  • [API Proposal]: `GetKeyedService` overload that takes a `System.Type` #102816
    10.0.0
  • paltest_pal_sxs_test1 failed on SmartOS x64 #35362
    Future
  • How NRBF Payload Reader should read DateTimes? #102826
    9.0.0
  • [libs][iOS] AdvSimdEncode hits PlatformNotSupportedException #96828
    9.0.0
  • . #106736
  • JIT: SVE - Add FFR lifetime tracking as well as test coverage for NonFaulting APIs #105163
    9.0.0
  • Infinite loop inside CodeGen::genCreateAddrMode while JIT optimizing #106607
    9.0.0
  • The type loader has silent integer overflows #97412
    10.0.0
  • Libraries build blocked by `System.TypeLoadException` #106731
  • Long running test: CounterSampleCalculator_ElapsedTime #80543
    Future
  • Test failure: System.Net.Quic.Tests.QuicConnectionTests.GetStreamCapacity_SumInvariant #106674
    10.0.0
  • JIT: SVE Cleanup - Simplify `emitIns_Mov` code when emitting RMW intrinsics #104841
    10.0.0
  • [wasm] XHarness SocketException: Transport endpoint is not connected #105370
    10.0.0
  • [browser][AOT][ST] table index is out of bounds #105010
    Future
  • mono assertion failure in CI: mono_class_get_flags: unexpected GC filler class #104956
    9.0.0
  • [wasm][aot] StringSplitTests and ArrayTests failing with NullReferenceException #105362
    9.0.0
  • Memory Mapped files access control classes missing in dotnet core #48793
    Future
  • Investigate if RSA issue can happen with ECDSA/ECDH on OpenSSL < 3.0 #105175
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'link' during 'Optimize Valnum CSEs' #106609
    9.0.0
  • Throw more informative exception when hosted CLR can’t find assemblies #4924
  • Document list of methods or method patterns that are not Ngen'ed or R2R Crossgen'ed #7285
  • c# string.TrimStart() unexpected behaviour #105367
  • Inefficient codegen for casts between same size types. #11413
    Future
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 1 Regression on 8/17/2024 12:12:18 AM #106708

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove Helper Method Frames from all `StubHelpers` #106793
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Enable all AVX-512 ISA's in Crossgen2 and ILC When Supported #106792
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Remove jit helpers for writing IBC log data #106791
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove ArrayClass::m_ElementType - get type from the type handle on MethodTable #106787
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Provide System.Composition.TypedParts package readme #106785
    area-System.Composition, community-contribution
  • Provide System.Composition.Runtime package readme #106784
    area-System.Composition, community-contribution
  • Provide System.Composition.Hosting package readme #106783
    area-System.Composition, community-contribution
  • Provide System.Composition.Convention package readme #106782
    area-System.Composition, community-contribution
  • Provide System.Composition.AttributedModel package readme #106781
    area-System.Composition
  • Fix embedded broadcasts for MaybeIMM instructions #106780
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use OpenSSL 3's KBKDF for SP800-108 if it is available #106779
    area-System.Security
  • Update Azure Linux tag names #106778
    needs-area-label
  • Update a few code paths to ensure the trimmer can do its job #106777
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • Sync shared code from aspnetcore #106773
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Fix bug in validating unused bits #106771
    area-System.Memory
  • [release/9.0] Add Non-Faulting behaviour for Sve.LoadVector*NonFaulting*() #106768
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix infinite loop in genCreateAddrMode #106767
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Fix infinite loop in genCreateAddrMode #106766
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Preserve range check for HW intrinsics with non-const/out-of-range immediates #106765
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Don't define HAS_CUSTOM_BLOCKS on mono #106764
    area-System.Memory
  • Delete check for old PowerPC Rosetta from CoreCLR PAL #106763
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Don't use STLUR with 0 offset #106760
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Parallelize superpmi-diffs pipeline per collection #106759
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Make SafeEvpPKeyHandle.OpenKeyFromProvider throw PNSE on OSSL less than 3.0 #106753
    area-System.Security
  • fix for DATAS assert during initialization stage #106752
    area-GC-coreclr
  • JIT: Move VN-based intrinsic expansion later #106750
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Added additional tests for generic attributes. #106745
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Add missing .alt_entry to CoreCLR *_FakeProlog methods #106744
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2520476 #106714
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/9.0] Fix Type System Equivalence Checks #106723
    Servicing-approved, area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Avoid signed overflow in DBG_FlushInstructionCache #105918
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] ELT profiler: fix reconstruction of struct args passed partially on the stack. #106747
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Split dotnet/runtime-only downlevel LibraryImport support into its own source generator #106436
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 10.0.0
  • Inject IJW Copy Constructor calls in the JIT instead of in the IL stubs #106424
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • ActivatorUtilities: Do not wrap Delegate.Invoke in another delegate #105814
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • [NRBF] Don't use Unsafe.As when decoding DateTime(s) #105749
    area-System.Formats.Nrbf, 9.0.0
  • Add GetKeyedService overload with Type #105860
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Fix Issue #105820 #106656
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix paltest_pal_sxs_test1 on illumos #105207
    area-PAL-coreclr, os-SunOS, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0] JIT: Avoid removing CSE candidates in fgMorphExpandCast #106746
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] [NativeAOT] Introduce pointer-based CompareExchange intrinsic and use operating with syncblock bits. #106727
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix Type System Equivalence Checks #106667
    Servicing-approved, area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.10
  • Fix infinite loop in genCreateAddrMode #106732
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add Non-Faulting behaviour for Sve.LoadVector*NonFaulting*() #106648
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0-rc1' => 'release/9.0' #106715
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [release/9.0] JIT: Cast UInt64 to Single directly during const folding #106720
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Error out when struct size is bigger than int.MaxValue #104393
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • [QUIC] Add synchronize for streams available callback #106678
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Explicitly use para separators in the System.Runtime.Intrinsics XML docs #106652
    documentation, area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • ARM64-SVE: Always call emitIns_Mov when canskip is true #106693
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Make SafeEvpPKeyHandle.OpenKeyFromProvider throw PNSE on OSSL less than 3.0 #106397
    area-System.Security, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Avoid removing CSE candidates in fgMorphExpandCast #106691
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Grab back some performance in `RuntimeTypeHandle::GetElementType` #106730
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Handle disabled algorithms on Azure Linux #106698
    area-System.Security, test-enhancement

Updated

  • Fix a case in MethodImpl overriding which wasn't handled as expected in ilc.exe for native aot #106716
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][mini] Interlocked.CompareExchange intrinsics for small types and enums #106660
    area-Codegen-Intrinsics-mono
  • [cdac] Basic ISOSDacInterface::GetMethodDescData #106413
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Fix stack overflow in the configuration source gen #106668
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Add Azure 3.0 helix test #106330
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add callback-based Encode to AsnWriter #106728
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Set GC metrics to zero prior to first GC #106734
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric
  • [release/9.0] Make GetPropertyCount public and fix its return value #106576
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/9.0] Fix invalid handle bug happening when `TypeBuilder` type used in exception catch clause #106704
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Fix MaxWorkingSet_GetNotStarted_ThrowsInvalidOperationException #105424
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, os-freebsd, os-mac-os-x, community-contribution
  • Don't keep members of pointer or byref element types #106215
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • pal init: Init membarrier() before first thread to improve start time #106724
    tenet-performance, area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • SunOS process and thread support #105403
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, os-SunOS, community-contribution
  • Use FeatureSwitchDefinition in a few places #106564
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Remove O(N) List<T>.RemoveAt from RegexCache.Add #106581
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 10.0.0
  • [Tar] Fill in the file size even if the file is empty. #106409
    community-contribution, area-System.Formats.Tar
  • Remove unused custom marshaler code and move ICustomMarshaler and Color marshalling handling to managed code #106735
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Fix resolving types with primary constructors using in parameters #105928
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Fix: SafeBerHandle and HGlobalMemHandle leaks in BerConverter #106316
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Fix GenerateResolveStub #106562
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Mark Encoding as nullable in StreamWriter's constructor #106658
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Switch DirectoryControl to use AsnWriter, AsnDecoder #101512
    NO-MERGE, area-System.DirectoryServices, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 10.0.0
  • Add Base64Url fuzzer #106509
    area-System.Buffers
  • Don't copy XUnit runner to output for local builds #106721
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update System.Net.* unit tests to react to SYSLIB0057 obsoletion #104487
    area-System.Net, test-enhancement
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2520986 #105829
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • [release/9.0] Add NativeRuntimeEventSource metadata to NativeAot CoreLib #106713
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Threading
  • [WASI] improve pollable #106633
    arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • The mask of shift amount in `IShiftOperators<byte, int, byte>` should be 7 #103900
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Remove package references from library tests #106737
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Target .NET 10 / net10.0 #106599
    area-Infrastructure
  • Remove the rest of the SimdAsHWIntrinsic support #106594
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Ensure that constant folding of bitwise operations for float/double are bitwise #106711
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Clean emsdk setup #106403
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Use ProjectReferences in inbox src projects #106329
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-libraries, blocked, 10.0.0
  • Fix trimming for DiagnosticSource #106680
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • JIT: Put all CSEs into SSA #106637
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [browser] Fix processing of satellite assemblies from referenced assembly during publish #106696
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Use TestExclusionList in bringup_runtest.sh #106201
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [NRBF] Address issues discovered by Threat Model #106629
    new-api-needs-documentation, binaryformatter-migration, area-System.Formats.Nrbf
  • NativeAOT the XUnitLogChecker #103795
    area-Infrastructure
  • Check HFA alignment for valuetype fields #106099
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Improve Guid v7 performance on Unix #106525
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
